instructions:
Melt butter in a 2 quart saucepan and sauté onions for about 5 minutes. Add mushroom soup to butter and
onions and stir until combined. Add mushroom liquid and stir until smooth. Finally stir in mushrooms. Pour
this mixture over the rice in a Pamed 9 x 13 inch Pyrex baking dish. Add in layers, the grated cheese and
toasted almonds. Bake in 350 F oven for 45 minutes. Serves 10.

*(Rev. 4/11/98)*

Notes:
To prepare 4 cups of cooked rice: In a 4 quart pot, bring 2 2/3 cups water, 1 1/3 cups long grain rice and
1/2 tsp salt to a boil. Reduce heat to low/warm and simmer covered for 14 or 15 minutes.
To toast almond slices: Place on a flat pan in a 325 F oven for 8 to 10 minutes.
name: Rice Casserole
creator: Jean Birnie
